other_conditions: morphologically homogenous crystals with the size of approximately 100 µm
solved single crystal structure in the orthorhombic space group Ima2
PXRD data fitted well with the simulated one based on its single crystal data
N2 gas adsorption at 77 K showed BET area of 3120 m2 g−1 and pore size approximately 1.7 nm
TGA showed 77.03% of weight loss under continuous air flow
XPS showed binding energy of Zr 3d5/2 orbital in the framework shifted by 0.7 eV compared to the original salt
DLS showed average diameter of the nanoparticle approximately 165 nm
average diameter of 191 nm and zeta potential decreased from +23 mV of pure nanoparticle to +6 mV of the plasmid complex
PXRD pattern analysis revealed that the crystallinity is retained after biomineralization
maximum plasmid loading content calculated to be 4.8 wt%
release behavior investigated at pH = 7.4 and 5.5, showing almost no plasmid released at pH = 7.4 after 3 days, whereas 90% plasmid released at pH = 5.5 after just 12 h
